li.label: ate cooked insect meat
li.description: I ate a meal cooked from gray, slimy insect meat. Eating kin like this is disgusting.

li.label: ate insect meat
li.description: I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. Eating kin like this is utterly awful. I wanna hurl.

li.label: ate cooked insect meat
li.description: I ate a meal cooked from gray, sssssslimy insect meat. I would have rathered it raw.

li.label: ate insect meat
li.description: I ate ssssssome gray, ssssslimy inssssect meat. Sssssso delicious! Sluuuuuurp

li.label: awful barrack
li.description: My barrack is an awful place, atleast we are together.

li.label: dull barrack
li.description: I feel bad for my fellow nestmates for having to stay in such a shabby place.

li.label: mediocre barrack
li.description: My barrack is mediocre, atleast we are able to stay close.

li.label: decent barrack
li.description: My barrack is decent, a few more knicknacks and it'll feel like home.

li.label: slightly impressive barrack
li.description: My barrack is a nice place. I can really picture us getting along in here.

li.label: impressive barrack
li.description: My barrack is impressive. It feels just like home.

li.label: very impressive barrack
li.description: My barrack is very impressive. It gives a really good homey feeling.

li.label: extremely impressive barrack
li.description: My barrack is extremely impressive. We all have enough space to stretch our wings!

li.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
li.description: My barrack is unbelievably impressive. I would challenge any humanlike to hate it!

li.label: wondrously impressive barrack
li.description: My barrack is the best place one can ever imagine. Fit for a Queen!!
